comment.language: The "Paschal Praise (Ywk te ]jom)" is chanted twelve times, alternating between the north and south choirs. From the Ninth Hour of Hosanna Sunday until the Ninth Hour of Tuesday, the following is chanted:
"Pujian Paskah (Ywk te ]jom)" dinyanyikan dua belas kali, bergantian antara paduan suara utara dan selatan. Dari Jam Kesembilan Minggu Hosanna hingga Jam Kesembilan Selasa, berikut ini dinyanyikan:

text.language: Ywk te ]jom nem piw~ou nem pic~mou nem pia~mahi sa e~neh a~m/n: Pa[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc
Thine is the power, the glory, the blessing, the majesty forever. Amen. My Lord Jesus Christ.

language.div: BagiMulah Kuasa kemuliaan, berkat, dan mulia selamanya amin, Tuhanku Yesus Kristus.

text.language: لك القوة والمجد والبركة والعزة إلى الأبد آمين ياربى يسوع المسيح.
